Workshops & Presentations

Parent Groups, Schools, Professional Groups, Adults, & Organizations

You are here:
  1. Home
  2. Services
  3. Workshops & Presentations

The clinicians at Behavior Therapy Associates can customize any presentation to meet the needs of your school, organization, or parent’s group. To arrange a workshop, call 732-873-1212 or email info@BehaviorTherapyAssociates.com

View our full list of mental health presentations, trainings and workshops below:

Available BTA Workshops

Professional ‘Best Practice’ Series

  • Best Practices for Including Children with Autism Spectrum Disorders

  • Best Practices for Conducting Ethical Evaluations

  • Best Practices for Social Skills Training
  • Best Practices for Treatment of Anxiety Disorders in Children/Adolescents
  • Disaffected Students: Meeting the Needs of General/Special Ed. Students
  • Autism: Best Practices for Appropriate Educational Programming

Social Skills/Bullying/Conflict Resolution

  • Bullying & Conflict Resolution

  • POWER-Solving®: Stepping Stones to Solving Life’s Everyday Problems

  • Fostering Conversation, Peer Interactions, Play Skills, & Problem-Solving

  • Helping Gifted Children Learn Anger Control and Positive Social Skills

  • Promoting Social Skills for Children in Inclusive Preschool Settings
  • Social Problem-Solving: Evidence-Based Practices
  • Social Skills Training: Summer Planning & Programs

Autism/Asperger’s/ADHD/Learning Disabilities

  • ADHD and the Gifted Student
  • ADHD: Overview & Effective Intervention
  • Understanding Autism and ABA -School Success-Behavior Management
  • Asperger’s Syndrome: Overview & Effective Intervention
  • Autism Spectrum Disorders: Overview & Effective Intervention
  • Autism Spectrum Disorders & Anxiety
  • Learning Disabilities: Overview & Effective Intervention
  • Secondary Emotional & Behavioral Reactions to Learning Disabilities
  • Adults with ADHD: Evaluation & Treatment
  • Autism Spectrum Disorder & Sexuality

Behavior Issues & Independence

  • Effective Intervention for Teens with Defiant and Disruptive Behavior
  • Behavioral Plans for Children with Significant Behaviors: Legal & Clinical Issues
  • Functional Behavior Assessment & Behavioral Intervention Plans
  • The Responsive Teaching Model and Suspensions
  • Positive Behavior Supports through POWER-Solving®
  • POWER-Solving®: Effective Problem Solving Outside the Box
  • Positive Behavior Supports at Home and in the Classroom
  • Promoting Student Independence & Successful Inclusion through systematic Use and Fading of Supports
  • Best Practices for Paraprofessionals Supporting Students

Just for Parents & Caregivers

  • Depression & Anger Management in Children and Adolescents
  • Depression & Anxiety in Adults
  • Helping Children Grieve: Dealing With Loss
  • Pediatric Obsessive Compulsive Disorder: Facts & Treatment
  • Stress Management for Kids: The Third Wave of Cognitive Behavior Therapy

Professional Issues, Values & Goals

  • Helping You and Your Organization Achieve Maximum Potential
  • Stress Management: Acceptance & Commitment Therapy
  • Acceptance & Commitment Therapy: Application for Children
  • ACTively Managing Stress Anxiety and Frustration
  • Valued Living and the Weight Loss Challenge
  • Business Practices for Behavior Analysts

Tics, Trichotillomania & Tourette Syndrome / Inclusion

  • Treating Tourette Syndrome and Related Disorders in Children and Adolescents
  • Habit reversal: Evidence-based Treatment for Childhood Tic Disorders
  • Trichotillomania: What Is It and How Do You Treat It
  • Effectively Including Children with Disabilities in General Education Classrooms
  • From Self-Contained to General Education: Planning for Successful Inclusion
  • Social Skills Interventions for Inclusive Settings
